author: Craig Leeming
comment: Despite emails from a support team givings steps I still can not get the seagate media app to connect to my cloud.   I have to use a web browser to do it.   And on the mac, it's ABSOLUTLY pointless trying in any form. I feel as if I've been ripped off.

author: G MARTINEZ
comment: This app and the Wireless Plus are Awesome! Thank you Seagate Developers for the strong support and swift responses whenever I'm in need... Google Play Team, You're as equally Awesome!

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Try the option to rebuild the database first using our Media app. This is located under "Settings", "Device Setting", "Rebuild Database". If problems continue, contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Max Yeo
comment: It will be perfect if support DSD music..... I follow the steps you mentions but still can't play DSD .... it still stick to default player ....

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: The Seagate Media app will play files that are natively supported by your mobile device. If the file type is not supported, try using a third-party player for streaming that supports the file. Open Media app & go to "Settings",  "Application settings", & uncheck "Use the app's player"  For additional help, please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: David Rowe
comment: purchased because thought it would link with all media devices but cant get it to work with my Sony android tv.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We would like the opportunity to talk with you directly to determine the root cause and find an available solution to the problem you are experiencing playing media files on your Sony Android TV. Please contact us using the following link to input your drive information & other details http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Rod Braman
comment: Very disappointed in this app and my seagate drive.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content:
We would like the opportunity to talk with you to determine the root cause and find an available solution to any problem you may be experiencing using this app and your Seagate drive. Please contact us directly using the following link to open a support case:

http://support2.seagate.com/

author: shane woodberry
comment: A lot better than last year. I can see my stuff. But can not find my personal file.

author: Dominicus Ajie
comment: Great, the update is useful now..

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We notice you have contacted us before on this problem and if our suggestions provided last month did not work, we would like the opportunity to talk with you directly to determine the root cause and find an available solution to the problem. Please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Jp Flanagan
comment: Well it's all good and fast to start

author: Cap Onehundred
comment: Doesn't work at all on Google pixel 2 XL. I can connect on same phone using the web interface via chrome. It finds the "mobile 4g  media server" but then I get a rotating circle followed by a cannot connect message. Cannot do anything including basic file management tasks. The troubleshooting steps listed mostly assume a WiFi connection, well what if I'm traveling for a few months? This is why Dropbox is better. It works and is reliable.

author: William Lim
comment: The app developement team should be sacked for developing such a laggy, unintuitive app. There is no way to access the private folders using the app. Defeating the purpose of a Cloud NAS...  Makes no effort to improve it when feedback were previously given. Utter disappointed.   Will not buy seagate NAS ever again. Seagate, you lost a customer forever.

author: John Wu
comment: Please revert back to previous version. Update has has rendered communication with tue NAS impossible, so nothing gets backed up at all now. Latest firmware on NAS and everything else can connect to the NAS, even other file managers on the phone.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Please first check to make sure you have the latest firmware for your Seagate drive. If you have the Personal Cloud, please reference the following article to check for updates: https://goo.gl/t7dZad Determine if you can connect locally, over 4g, or over another wifi network. Otherwise, contact us directly at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Colin Kearns
comment: After plenty of problems with this app over time, I finally have it at a semi-workable state. That said, it can still struggle with a connection despite having excellent signal and backups often just stop mid backup requiring a force close and an app restart. So overall disappointing still.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Please first check to make sure you have the latest firmware. If you have the Personal Cloud, please reference the following article to check for updates: https://goo.gl/t7dZad Determine if you can connect locally, over 4g, or over another wifi network. Otherwise, contact us directly so we may assist further: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

comment: Simply will not connect to drive. Will not accept my user name or password. I can connect through Seagate web app with no problems so it has to be the app. This is a Samsung galaxy S7 edge (plenty of these around). Do you guys & gals at Seagate check your software before releasing it? You need to fix this quickly - if your previous versions worked then put THEM back up on the store until you've fixed this faulty software. This is really BAD publicity for your company - Why don't you do yourselves a favour? - Update - latest update is the same - i.e. useless.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Please first check to make sure you have the latest firmware for your Seagate drive. If you have the Personal Cloud, please reference: https://goo.gl/t7dZad  Otherwise, contact us directly so we may assist further: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Ian Venni
comment: Ever since I did the firmware update the app can't connect to the NAS. Worked without fault before. Very dissatisfied. For God's sake please either sort this or let us revert back to previous version !!!!! NAS is on latest firmware before you even ask. Beyond a joke now !  So after working again for a while, now will not connect to at all via app. States 'server fault'. Clearly there isn't as can connect from everything else! This bloody app is a complete waste of time.

author: Judge jewels
comment: Absolutely shite, didnt used to be. Remote connection "server error"  Pay a small fortune for a piece of kit and all of a sudden Ooooh youve got to upgrade the NAS hardware again

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Please first check to make sure you have the latest firmware. If you have the Personal Cloud, please reference the following article to check for updates: https://goo.gl/t7dZad Determine if you can connect locally, over 4g, or over another wifi network. Otherwise, contact us directly so we may assist further: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Owen Hopkin
comment: Sorry can't bring myself to talk about this piece of Junk. Not fit for purpose after April 2018. Wasted my money on Seagate Central. GoodBye Seagate!

author: Edward Homson
comment: I have used this app for a number of years, following a recent update I can no longer get wireless access to my HDD. You have ruined what was once a great app that allowed me to travel and work without a laptop. Please revert back to something that works.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Please check to make sure you have the latest update of our Media app and the latest firmware for your Seagate drive. If the issue persists, please contact us using the following link with the details of the problem so we may investigate further: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Michael Kesuma
comment: The app has served me well for couple years now but the current version has a bug. I'm not able to click on the search function, be it for movies or music...

author: Kevin Cornejo
comment: Always building libraries, slow, hard to figure out how to connect. Clunky. Needs up update libraries nightly and automatically. Tells me I'm not connect to a network when I am. Remote access is tricky to do. Not intuitive.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Try re-indexing your files as this will work to rebuild the data on Media app.This make a while to do if you have many media files. From your PersonalCloud web UI go to Device Manager, then Services, Seagate Media, Edit, Stop. Then Start and Re-index. Also check for firmware updates for Personal Cloud. For additional help, try  http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

comment: Avoid seagate products at all cost. Can access private folder on laptop but on mobile devices, it keeps redirecting to a web browser. Nothing works on my S7 and my iPad. Will never ever buy any Seagate BS anymore

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Here are instructions on how to share private folders on your Personal Cloud to your Seagate Media app, listed under header "Provide public access to selected media in your private folder": https://goo.gl/ERXm8e For additional assistance, please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Edwin Engels
comment: Can't access my Private folder unless I make it public. That is dumb as the folder is private for a reason!

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We will pass along to our developers your suggestion regarding accessing private data without other users being able to access from mobile devices. We are always looking for suggestions to improve the app and will consider incorporating these in future updates. For additional assistance, please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Dan Freedman
comment: User friendliness is getting there. Speed is fine, but opening to show all tracks in an album sometimes makes for some intense scrolling action. E.g. choose to display by Genre, then each album is listed. With a large collection it would be better to use search. Better still is genre opens to artist then that would open to albums which then open to tracks.

author: Goland Rb
comment: Se traba cada 5 min!! Estoy viendo una película y se corta la conexión entre mi celular o mi tablet exactamente cada 5 min , es imposible ver o escuchar musica por que se corta arreglen eso por favor

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: Can you please check if you have the Smart Network Switch feature turned on? (Should be located under the advanced Wifi settings). If it is turned on, this would mean your device automatically switches Networks.

author: Reuben Chung
comment: I cannot get any sound from the video, is there a way to fix this?

author: Karam
comment: Crashed many times and some times media didn't work until reconfigure the application again

author: Adrien Chazottes
comment: App is very unreliable, files upload doesn't always work and keep looping the upload process. Highly unfriendly to use to backup contents.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: If you are using with one of our network drives, try the "Auto-upload" option to see if this works better. There could be a variety of possible causes for interruption of the upload process. Please contact us directly so we can determine the root cause and find an available solution: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Liet Kynes
comment: after few last updates this app crashes my moto g4 plus with nougat 7.0. please revert to previous version.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We notice that you are running app version 2.25.0.09. Please check again for more updates. If the problem continues, please contact us directly so we can assist you: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy Also open the App & go to "Help", then "Report a Problem". This will forward logs to us that can be used to determine the underlying cause and available resolution

author: Graham Crowe
comment: Latest version has stopped my android phone and android tablet communicating with the NAS. PC can communicate.  Phone and tablet have worked previously.

author: Zvonko Hrastić
comment: It's ok! Subtitle support missing. Limited video formats supported for streaming (.mp4 yes, .avi isn't) Ok. Fale subtitlovi. Podrzava za streaming samo mp4....

author: jimbo retired sparky
comment: Tricky to setup but works well once going

author: Mike Muratorri
comment: I don't know why this app needs my contact list and other files. I don't need this app that bad.

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We would like the opportunity to talk with you directly to determine the cause and find an available solution to the problem as our Media app should not require this information. Please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Peter Wong
comment: New firmware doesn't support up load from mobile device now???

author: cv n
comment: Most of the time, doesn't detect DNA device in network :(

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: If you have a Personal Cloud device, check to see if your DLNA settings are enabled within your admin utility (under Services) for the Personal Cloud (if this is what you meant). Otherwise, please contact us using the following information so we can gather additional details: http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

author: Maths Careers
comment: Can't Access sd card folder . Can't select folder for copy .

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We would like the opportunity to talk with you directly to determine the root cause and find an available solution to the problem you are experiencing accessing and copying from the SD card using the Media app. Please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

comment: Can't get this to connect to my drive!

Seagate Support

comment: Worst of all

reply.author: Seagate Technology LLC
reply.content: We would like the opportunity to talk with you directly to determine the root cause and find an available solution to the problem you are experiencing with the Media app. Please contact us at http://goo.gl/SeFhmy

comment: nice, keep improve it
